data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Paget, Bermuda. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Paget, Bermuda
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Lord, the the state of Paget will disappear one day, but your Word will never disappear. Call all who claim Christianity to anchor their lives on your Word.
data.verse: Heaven and earth will disappear, but my words will never disappear.

data.prayer: Father, please raise up every one you have called in Paget, Bermuda to become worthy of their calling, and offer spiritual sacrifices acceptable to you through Jesus.
data.verse: I urge you to live a life worthy of the calling you have received

data.prayer: Spirit, please start new house churches in every neighborhood of the state of Paget.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the Lord as the waters cover the sea.

data.prayer: Spirit, please defend the 1,543 believers in Paget against self-centered spirituality. Open their eyes to the fields ripe for harvest around them.
God in Heaven, only you can and should appoint evangelists. Please, appoint and send more to Paget, Bermuda.
data.verse: And in the church God has appointed first of all apostles, second prophets, third teachers, then workers of miracles, and those with gifts of healing, helping, administration, and various tongues.

data.prayer: Lord, help the people of Paget, Bermuda to discover the essence of being a disciple, making disciples, and how to plant churches that multiply.

data.section_summary:
the state of Paget, Bermuda has a population of 5,900.

We estimate Paget has 1,543 people who might know Jesus, 3,865 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 492 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 3 neighbors who need Jesus.
